member.summary: Specifies the Ticks placement with range slider.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.TickPlacement.BottomRight
member.summary: The ticks are placed bottom for horizontal orientation and right for vertical orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.TickPlacement.Inline
member.summary: The ticks are placed inside the range slider.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.TickPlacement.None
member.summary: The ticks are not showing.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.TickPlacement.Outside
member.summary: The ticks are placed both side for horizontal orientation ticks are in top and bottom and for vertical orientation ticks are in left and right.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.TickPlacement.TopLeft
member.summary: The ticks are placed top for horizontal orientation and left for vertical orientation.

member.summary: Specifies the SliderSnapsTo with range slider.

member.summary: Conform the indicator to the step values.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.SliderSnapsTo.Ticks
member.summary: Conform the indicator to the tick marks.

member.summary: specifies the Thumb ToolTip placement with range slider.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.ThumbToolTipPlacement.BottomRight
member.summary: The tooltip placed bottom for horizontal orientation and right for vertical orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.ThumbToolTipPlacement.None
member.summary: The tooltip is not showing.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Input.ThumbToolTipPlacement.TopLeft
